WARNING_MESSAGE:
Warning! Service is under maintenance now.
Please do not use it until this message is shown.

TWO_FACTOR_AUTH.TITLE: Two-factor authentication
TWO_FACTOR_AUTH.DESCRIPTION: We strongly recommend you to Enable 2FA

LIST_STEPS.STEP_2: Add mywish app in your Google Authenticator or in similar app
LIST_STEPS.STEP_3: Use code every time when login to MyWish

CROWDSALE.TITLE: Crowdsale contract
CROWDSALE.DESCRIPTION: Start your ICO/Token sale with a few clicks

TOKEN.TITLE: Token contract
TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: If you don't need a Crowdsale, you can create a token and distribute it yourself

LOST_KEY.TITLE: Lost key
LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: The smart contract has all the same features as the standard Ethereum wallet and, in addition, redirecting your funds to the backup wallet, if you will lose the access/private key.

DEFERRED.TITLE: Deferred payment
DEFERRED.DESCRIPTION: Smart contract makes payment on a specified date.

WILL.TITLE: Will contract
WILL.DESCRIPTION: Setup the transfer of funds to family or friends, in case of long inactive period of time (death, accidents & so on).

WEDDING.TITLE: Wedding contract
WEDDING.DESCRIPTION: Wallet with Multisig function & distribution of funds between the owners after/during specified period of time.

LIST.LIST_ITEM_1: Contracts in Test Net are free for use (you can create & deploy it to test network)
LIST.LIST_ITEM_2: Please accept low speed for deployment (up to 3 hours)
LIST.LIST_ITEM_3: Contracts in Test/ Main network have identical code
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4: Please use Test Net addresses (Ropsten for ETH) while working with contracts

LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_2: Choose Will contract & set it up. MyWish generates your personal smart contract.
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_3: Make a payment & MyWish deploys the contract to the RSK network.
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_4: Smart contract is deployed & ready for execution.

LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_1: User regularly calls the contract to confirm itsâ€™ "live" status.
LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_2: If no confirmation during the specified timeframe is detected, the contract distributes the funds to heirs.

EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.TITLE: External Developers
EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.DESCRIPTION: To add your contract to the MyWish library and start audit process, fill the form below.
